# 14.1 Создание и использование секретов
1. Работа с секретами через утилиту kubectl
  - Создание секрета:
    ``` bash
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# openssl genrsa -out cert.key 4096
    Generating RSA private key, 4096 bit long modulus (2 primes)
    .........................................................................................................................++++
    ..............++++
    e is 65537 (0x010001)

    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# openssl req -x509 -new -key cert.key -days 3650 -out cert.crt \
    > -subj '/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/CN=server.local'

    # В примере почему-то ключи создаются в текйщем каталоге, а применяются из каталога /cert/
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl create secret tls domain-cert --cert=certs/cert.crt --key=certs/cert.key
    error: Cannot read file certs/cert.crt, open certs/cert.crt: no such file or directory

    # Сертификаты по текущим путям
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl create secret tls domain-cert --cert=cert.crt --key=cert.key
    secret/domain-cert created
    ```
  - Смотрим список секретов
    ``` bash
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secrets
    NAME                                            TYPE                                  DATA   AGE
    default-token-7pj9h                             kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d22h
    domain-cert                                     kubernetes.io/tls                     2      2m35s
    nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-token-89cwg   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d17h
    sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1                helm.sh/release.v1                    1      2d17h

    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secret
    NAME                                            TYPE                                  DATA   AGE
    default-token-7pj9h                             kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d22h
    domain-cert                                     kubernetes.io/tls                     2      2m35s
    nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-token-89cwg   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d17h
    sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1                helm.sh/release.v1                    1      2d17h
    ```
  - Информация в формате YAML и/или JSON
    ``` bash
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml
    apiVersion: v1
    data:
    tls.crt: 
    tls.key: 
    kind: Secret
    metadata:
    creationTimestamp: "2022-04-07T03:30:25Z"
    name: domain-cert
    namespace: default
    resourceVersion: "220416"
    uid: 865e49bf-cdac-4a3c-bbb3-e19580b2bcf5
    type: kubernetes.io/tls
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json
    {
        "apiVersion": "v1",
        "data": {
            "tls.crt": "",
            "tls.key": ""
        },
        "kind": "Secret",
        "metadata": {
            "creationTimestamp": "2022-04-07T03:30:25Z",
            "name": "domain-cert",
            "namespace": "default",
            "resourceVersion": "220416",
            "uid": "865e49bf-cdac-4a3c-bbb3-e19580b2bcf5"
        },
        "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
    }
    ```
  - Выгружаем секрет в файл
    ``` bash
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secrets -o json > secrets.json
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml > domain-cert.yml

    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# cat secrets.json domain-cert.yml
    {
        "apiVersion": "v1",
        "items": [
            {
                "apiVersion": "v1",
                "data": {
                    "ca.crt": "",
                    "namespace": "ZGVmYXVsdA==",
                    "token": ""
                },
                "kind": "Secret",
                "metadata": {
                    "annotations": {
                        "kubernetes.io/service-account.name": "default",
                        "kubernetes.io/service-account.uid": "e61c04ed-f788-4c2b-9218-9d4ca2324150"
                    },
                    "creationTimestamp": "2022-04-04T04:44:54Z",
                    "name": "default-token-7pj9h",
                    "namespace": "default",
                    "resourceVersion": "427",
                    "uid": "9eafc029-9d25-4995-8641-3de7722ff0d5"
                },
                "type": "kubernetes.io/service-account-token"
            },
            {
                "apiVersion": "v1",
                "data": {
                    "tls.crt": "",
                    "tls.key": ""
                },
                "kind": "Secret",
                "metadata": {
                    "creationTimestamp": "2022-04-07T03:30:25Z",
                    "name": "domain-cert",
                    "namespace": "default",
                    "resourceVersion": "220416",
                    "uid": "865e49bf-cdac-4a3c-bbb3-e19580b2bcf5"
                },
                "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
            },
            {
                "apiVersion": "v1",
                "data": {
                    "ca.crt": "",
                    "namespace": "ZGVmYXVsdA==",
                    "token": ""
                },
                "kind": "Secret",
                "metadata": {
                    "annotations": {
                        "kubernetes.io/service-account.name": "nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner",
                        "kubernetes.io/service-account.uid": "2a61f2f4-15b5-4c2e-8619-513bc21d07bd"
                    },
                    "creationTimestamp": "2022-04-04T10:09:34Z",
                    "name": "nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-token-89cwg",
                    "namespace": "default",
                    "resourceVersion": "34097",
                    "uid": "d44a8641-d71a-4f6a-853f-930d39a9c914"
                },
                "type": "kubernetes.io/service-account-token"
            },
            {
                "apiVersion": "v1",
                "data": {
                    "release": ""
                },
                "kind": "Secret",
                "metadata": {
                    "creationTimestamp": "2022-04-04T10:09:34Z",
                    "labels": {
                        "modifiedAt": "1649066974",
                        "name": "nfs-server",
                        "owner": "helm",
                        "status": "deployed",
                        "version": "1"
                    },
                    "name": "sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1",
                    "namespace": "default",
                    "resourceVersion": "34104",
                    "uid": "0965f099-b75b-477c-a1f3-8aa4e117d358"
                },
                "type": "helm.sh/release.v1"
            }
        ],
        "kind": "List",
        "metadata": {
            "resourceVersion": "",
            "selfLink": ""
        }
    }
    apiVersion: v1
    data:
    tls.crt: 
    tls.key: 
    kind: Secret
    metadata:
    creationTimestamp: "2022-04-07T03:30:25Z"
    name: domain-cert
    namespace: default
    resourceVersion: "220416"
    uid: 865e49bf-cdac-4a3c-bbb3-e19580b2bcf5
    type: kubernetes.io/tls
    ```
  - Удаляем секрет
    ``` bash
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl delete secret domain-cert
    secret "domain-cert" deleted

    # Проверка
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secrets
    NAME                                            TYPE                                  DATA   AGE
    default-token-7pj9h                             kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d22h
    nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-token-89cwg   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d17h
    sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1                helm.sh/release.v1                    1      2d17h
    ```
  - Грузим секрет из файла
    ``` bash
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl apply -f domain-cert.yml
    secret/domain-cert created

    # Проверка
    root@cpl:/home/grayfix# kubectl get secrets
    NAME                                            TYPE                                  DATA   AGE
    default-token-7pj9h                             kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d22h
    domain-cert                                     kubernetes.io/tls                     2      2s
    nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-token-89cwg   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      2d17h
    sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1                helm.sh/release.v1                    1      2d17h

    ```

2. Работа с секретами внутри модуля
  - Добавим еще один секрет в виде логина и пароля
    ``` bash
    root@cpl:/data/clokub-05# kubectl create secret generic secret-password --from-literal=username=admin --from-literal=password=admin
    secret/secret-password created
    ```
  - Опишем деплой
    ``` yaml
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    metadata:
    name: test-example
    labels:
        app: test-example
    spec:
    replicas: 1
    selector:
        matchLabels:
        app: test-example
    template:
        metadata:
        labels:
            app: test-example
        spec:
        containers:
        - name: backend
            image: praqma/network-multitool
            env:
            - name: SECRET_USERNAME
                valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                    name: secret-password
                    key: username
                    optional: false
            - name: SECRET_PASSWORD
                valueFrom:
                secretKeyRef:
                    name: secret-password
                    key: password
                    optional: false
            volumeMounts:
            - name: cert
            mountPath: "/data/certs"
            readOnly: true
        volumes:
        - name: cert
            secret:
            secretName: domain-cert
            optional: false
    ```
  - Деплой и проверка
    ``` bash
    # Деплоим
    root@cpl:/data/clokub-05# kubectl apply -f 01-example.yaml
    deployment.apps/test-example created

    #Смотрим поды
    root@cpl:/data/clokub-05# kubectl get po
    NAME                                  READY   STATUS    RESTARTS      AGE
    nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-0   1/1     Running   3 (29m ago)   2d17h
    test-example-78bc8f9548-gflbp         1/1     Running   0             9s

    #Входим внутрь пода test-example-78bc8f9548-gflbp
    root@cpl:/data/clokub-05# kubectl exec -it test-example-78bc8f9548-gflbp -- bash

    #Проверка переменных окружения
    bash-5.1# env | grep SECRET_
    SECRET_USERNAME=admin
    SECRET_PASSWORD=admin

    #Проверка каталога с сертификатами
    bash-5.1# ls -al /data/certs/
    total 4
    drwxrwxrwt    3 root     root           120 Apr  7 03:58 .
    drwxr-xr-x    3 root     root          4096 Apr  7 03:58 ..
    drwxr-xr-x    2 root     root            80 Apr  7 03:58 ..2022_04_07_03_58_38.3330976513
    lrwxrwxrwx    1 root     root            32 Apr  7 03:58 ..data -> ..2022_04_07_03_58_38.3330976513
    lrwxrwxrwx    1 root     root            14 Apr  7 03:58 tls.crt -> ..data/tls.crt
    lrwxrwxrwx    1 root     root            14 Apr  7 03:58 tls.key -> ..data/tls.key
    ```
